title: Saudis Signal Intention to Ease Pace of Bond Sales Growth
description: Saudi Arabia sees stable to lower international bond sales in 2026, signaling a possible halt to three years of rapid growth in borrowing activities that have made the kingdom one of the busiest sovereign issuers in global emerging markets.
content: Saudi Arabia sees stable to lower international bond sales in 2026, signaling a possible halt to three years of rapid growth in borrowing activities that have made the kingdom one of the busiest sovereign issuers in global emerging markets.
